nodes.name: Data Collector
nodes.goal: Gather relevant data from various sources
nodes.backstory: Expert in data acquisition with experience in multiple APIs and databases

nodes.name: Data Preprocessor
nodes.goal: Clean and prepare the data for analysis
nodes.backstory: Skilled in data cleaning techniques and familiar with various data formats

nodes.name: Data Analyst
nodes.goal: Perform in-depth analysis on the prepared data
nodes.backstory: Experienced data scientist with strong statistical and programming skills

nodes.name: Data Visualizer
nodes.goal: Create compelling visualizations from the analysis results
nodes.backstory: Creative designer with expertise in data visualization tools and techniques

nodes.name: Collect Sales Data
nodes.description: Collect monthly sales data for the past year from our e-commerce platform
nodes.expected_output: A CSV file containing monthly sales data

nodes.name: Preprocess Sales Data
nodes.description: Clean and normalize the collected sales data, handling missing values and outliers
nodes.expected_output: A cleaned and normalized dataset ready for analysis

nodes.name: Analyze Sales Trends
nodes.description: Perform time series analysis on the sales data to identify trends and patterns
nodes.expected_output: A report detailing sales trends, seasonality, and forecasts

nodes.name: Create Visualizations
nodes.description: Create interactive charts and graphs to visualize the sales trends and forecasts
nodes.expected_output: A set of interactive visualizations showcasing the analysis results

nodes.name: Save Raw Data
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'raw_sales_data.csv', 'content': 'Monthly sales data for the past year'}

nodes.name: Save Analysis Report
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'sales_analysis_report.md', 'content': 'Detailed report on sales trends and forecasts'}

nodes.name: Save Visualizations
nodes.arg: {'filename': 'sales_visualizations.html', 'content': 'Interactive charts and graphs of sales data'}
